TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObservable`1<+ T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IObservable

span.span: The object that provides notification information.

summary.span: 定义基于推送的通知的提供程序。

span.span: Defines a provider for push-based notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和接口提供通用的机制，以基于推送的通知，也称为观察程序设计模式。The and interfaces provide a generalized mechanism for push-based notification, also known as the observer design pattern. 接口表示发送通知 （提供程序）; 类接口表示接收它们 （观察者） 的类。The interface represents the class that sends notifications (the provider); the interface represents the class that receives them (the observer). `T` 表示提供通知信息的类。`T` represents the class that provides the notification information. 在某些基于推送的通知中，实现和`T`可表示相同的类型。In some push-based notifications, the implementation and `T` can represent the same type. 提供程序必须实现单个方法，指示观察者想要接收基于推送的通知。The provider must implement a single method, , that indicates that an observer wants to receive push-based notifications. 对方法的调用方传递观察程序的实例。Callers to the method pass an instance of the observer. 该方法返回使观察程序提供程序已停止发送它们之前随时取消通知的实现。The method returns an implementation that enables observers to cancel notifications at any time before the provider has stopped sending them. 在任何给定时间，给定的提供程序可能有零行、 一行或多个观察程序。At any given time, a given provider may have zero, one, or multiple observers. 提供程序负责存储对观察者的引用，并确保它们有效之前它将通知发送。The provider is responsible for storing references to observers and ensuring that they are valid before it sends notifications. 接口不进行任何假设数观察者或发送通知的顺序。The interface does not make any assumptions about the number of observers or the order in which notifications are sent. 提供程序通过调用将以下三种通知发送给观察者方法：The provider sends the following three kinds of notifications to the observer by calling methods: - 当前数据。The current data. 提供程序可以调用方法通过观察者`T`具有当前数据、 更改的数据，还是保持数据的对象。The provider can call the method to pass the observer a `T` object that has current data, changed data, or fresh data. - 错误条件。An error condition. 提供程序可以调用方法通知观察者已发生某个错误条件。The provider can call the method to notify the observer that some error condition has occurred. - 没有更多的数据。No further data. 提供程序可以调用方法通知观察者，它已完成发送通知。The provider can call the method to notify the observer that it has finished sending notifications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示观察程序设计模式。The following example illustrates the observer design pattern. 它定义`Location`包含纬度和经度信息的类。It defines a `Location` class that contains latitude and longitude information. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#5)] `LocationTracker`类提供实现。The `LocationTracker` class provides the implementation. 其`TrackLocation`方法传递一个可以为 null`Location`包含纬度和经度数据的对象。Its `TrackLocation` method is passed a nullable `Location` object that contains the latitude and longitude data. 如果`Location`值不是`null`、`TrackLocation`方法调用的每个观察程序的方法。If the `Location` value is not `null`, the `TrackLocation` method calls the method of each observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#6)] 如果`Location`值是`null`、`TrackLocation`方法实例化`LocationUnknownException`对象，在下面的示例所示。If the `Location` value is `null`, the `TrackLocation` method instantiates a `LocationUnknownException` object, which is shown in the following example. 然后，它调用每个观察程序方法并将其传递`LocationUnknownException`对象。It then calls each observer's method and passes it the `LocationUnknownException` object. 请注意，`LocationUnknownException`派生自，但未添加任何新的成员。Note that `LocationUnknownException` derives from , but does not add any new members. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#7)] 观察者注册以接收通知从`TrackLocation`对象通过调用其方法，将对观察程序对象的引用分配给私有泛型对象。Observers register to receive notifications from a `TrackLocation` object by calling its method, which assigns a reference to the observer object to a private generic object. 该方法返回`Unsubscriber`对象，它是使观察程序停止接收通知的实现。The method returns an `Unsubscriber` object, which is an implementation that enables observers to stop receiving notifications. `LocationTracker`类还进行了`EndTransmission`方法。The `LocationTracker` class also includes an `EndTransmission` method. 当没有更多位置数据可用时，该方法调用每个观察程序方法，然后再清除观察者的内部列表。When no further location data is available, the method calls each observer's method and then clears the internal list of observers. 在此示例中，`LocationReporter`类提供实现。In this example, the `LocationReporter` class provides the implementation. 它向控制台显示有关当前的位置的信息。It displays information about the current location to the console. 其构造函数包括`name`参数，它使`LocationReporter`实例在其字符串输出中标识自身。Its constructor includes a `name` parameter, which enables the `LocationReporter` instance to identify itself in its string output. 它还包括`Subscribe`方法，该包装到提供程序的调用方法方法。It also includes a `Subscribe` method, which wraps a call to the provider's method. 这允许方法将返回到私有变量的引用。This allows the method to assign the returned reference to a private variable. `LocationReporter`类还进行了`Unsubscribe`方法，后者将调用方法返回的对象方法。The `LocationReporter` class also includes an `Unsubscribe` method, which calls the method of the object that is returned by the method. 下面的代码定义`LocationReporter`类。The following code defines the `LocationReporter` class. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#8)] 提供程序和观察者，然后实例化下面的代码。The following code then instantiates the provider and the observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/module1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IDisposable Subscribe(class System.IObserver`1<!T> observer) cil managed
Public Function Subscribe (observer As IObserver(Of Out T)) As IDisposable

span.span: The object that is to receive notifications.

summary.span: 通知提供程序观察程序将接收通知。

span.span: Notifies the provider that an observer is to receive notifications.

returns.span: 对接口的引用，它允许观察程序在提供程序完成发送通知前停止接收通知。

span.span: A reference to an interface that allows observers to stop receiving notifications before the provider has finished sending them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用方法来注册基于推送的通知的观察者。The method must be called to register an observer for push-based notifications. 典型实现方法执行以下：A typical implementation of the method does the following: - 将对观察者的引用存储在集合对象，如对象。It stores a reference to the observer in a collection object, such as a object. - 它返回到引用接口。It returns a reference to an interface. 这使观察者取消订阅 (即，停止接收通知) 之前的提供程序已完成发送和调用订阅服务器的方法。This enables observers to unsubscribe (that is, to stop receiving notifications) before the provider has finished sending them and called the subscriber's method. 在任意给定时间的特定实例实现都负责处理所有订阅和通知所有订阅服务器。At any given time, a particular instance of an implementation is responsible for handling all subscriptions and notifying all subscribers. 除非特定的文档实现指示，否则观察者应做任何假设实现，如多个观察程序将接收的通知的顺序。Unless the documentation for a particular implementation indicates otherwise, observers should make no assumptions about the implementation, such as the order of notifications that multiple observers will receive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示报告纬度和经度信息的应用程序的方法。The following example illustrates the method for an application that reports latitude and longitude information. 它定义存储对所有观察程序引用的集合对象。It defines an collection object that stores references to all observers. 它还返回一个名为的专用类`Unsubscriber`实现接口，并且允许订阅服务器停止接收事件通知。It also returns a private class named `Unsubscriber` that implements the interface and enables subscribers to stop receiving event notifications. 请参阅示例部分有关完整示例的主题。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#13)]
